discrepancies.finding: Document does not specify the place for presentation
Document does not specify the availability and expiry date
discrepancies.rule: UCP 600, article 6, availability, expiry date and place for presentation

discrepancies.finding: Document does not specify the standard for examination of documents
Document does not specify the corrections and alterations procedure
Document does not specify the data conflict resolution procedure

Document contains the pier or airport details
